1911 T206 Gold Border Blank Backs.   $1100 each includes free insured shipping via Priority Mail.  Please see my ebay comments, seller carolenny.
Bud Sharpe Boston Rustlers Braves
Jimmy Archer Chicago Cubs
William Bailey St. Louis Americans

All are graded SGC Authentic due to the blank backs
I’ll take them all if still available.
